document.discussion_title: Manchester United and Crystal Palace book FA Cup final spots – Football Weekly | Football
document.topic_text: Manchester United and Crystal Palace into the FA Cup final – Football Weekly The podders look back on all the action at Wembley. Plus, Leicester power on without Jamie Vardy; Sunderland squeeze out of the relegation zone; and Champions League and Europa League semi-finals previews Subscribe via iTunes Download MP3 Podcast feed URL Presented by James Richardson and produced by Ben Green ; with Paolo Bandini , Nick Ames and Barry Glendenning Monday 25 April 2016 15.39 BST Last modified on Monday 25 April 2016 16.00 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email Share on Pinterest Share on LinkedIn Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp On today’s Football Weekly : • AC Jimbo , Barry Glendenning , Nick Ames , Paolo Bandini • Manchester United and Crystal Palace win their FA Cup semi-finals ; no Vardy, no problem for Leicester ; the fight for survival in the Premier League; and the fight for promotion from the Championship • Previews of the semi-final first legs in the Champions League and Europa League • And this in Milan . It’s Football Weekly, Jim, pretty much exactly as you know it, with added: • Beards • And tickets to the London Palladium
document.post: Do the playoffs not make a certain percentage of the league games academic? Yes. But that's show-bizz, make it more entertaining. You have probably already seen the ads which state that betting on games makes them even more enjoyable.
